name: Crab Tsar
desc: Its mind infected by ancient moonlight, this ruler of crabs was plunged for a time into delirium and madness. But just as it was about to unleash its might, it suffered a crushing defeat at the hands of a thief who broke into its court, rendering it more agreeable. Even so, this crustacean suzerain yet yearns to clash pincers with strong foes, longing to triumph over opponents worthy of its full might.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Lakkaberry
customize.desc:
A fruit as white as pearl that tastes refreshingly sweet.
In the legends of the Frostmoon Scions, these fruits, like kuuhenki, are a gift from the Moon Maiden, a sacred symbol blessed by the new moon. Therefore, sharing and eating delicious Lakkaberries is also a form of worshipping Kuutar.
Even when not associated with the divine, their plumpness and sweetness alone are enough to awaken one's appetite.

customize.text: Convert at least 10 of the Crab Tsar's Stoneborne Seeds.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text:
Shoot down the Crab Tsar before it executes its "Almighty Bombardment" for the second time.
<color=#ffd780>World Level must reach 9</color>

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Guide to Moonlight
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
"Moonlight" is the blessing of the land beneath the moon.
The cloud-veiled moonlight glows but faintly over the boundless dark wilds. Yet its fragile glimmer is a guide through the endless night.

dropMaterial.name: Lakkaberry
dropMaterial.desc:
A fruit as white as pearl that tastes refreshingly sweet.
In the legends of the Frostmoon Scions, these fruits, like kuuhenki, are a gift from the Moon Maiden, a sacred symbol blessed by the new moon. Therefore, sharing and eating delicious Lakkaberries is also a form of worshipping Kuutar.
Even when not associated with the divine, their plumpness and sweetness alone are enough to awaken one's appetite.

dropMaterial.name: Midsommar Berry
dropMaterial.desc:
A fruit that grows in the warmer parts of Nod-Krai. It is beloved by animals emerging from winter and hungry children alike.
In the legacy of the Frostmoon Scions, Midsommar Berries are regarded as a symbol of life and abundance, for they only flourish during the warmth of spring and summer.
There is a tale that tells of the endless struggle between the King of Winter Holly and the King of Summer Oak — twin monarchs that slay each other as the seasons change, returning from the underworld to rule in turn until the end of time. Most Snezhnayan scholars dismiss this as a primitive religious metaphor for the alternating seasons — or at least that's what they tell themselves.

value.name: Sternshield Crab
value.desc:
A crab that makes its home in borrowed shells.

Armored Crabs are constantly searching for shells that fit their bodies as they grow. A storybook that told the tale of the trials of an Armored Crab searching for a suitable shell was extremely popular in Fontaine for a time. Though the story is filled with childlike wonder, the reaction after proved that, like many fairytales, it touched adults even more deeply.

value.name: The Mirrors, the Maze, and the Tsar
value.desc: You discover a deep pit near the Frostmoon Enclave...
